DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine objective response rate , duration response , time disease progression , duration survival woman metastatic breast cancer treat gemcitabine doxorubicin HCl liposome . II . Determine qualitative quantitative toxicity reversibility toxicity treatment regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive gemcitabine intravenous ( IV ) 30 minute day 1 8 doxorubicin HCl liposome IV 2.5 hour day 1 . Treatment continue every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 3 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 22-46 patient accrue study within 20 month .
